column4: acidchild,  there is a utility named  Dban you can download and burn to disk
I think dban is overkill in this case.
Defrag is not required before resizing ntfs.
It does not (unless you specifically ask it to). It uses the free space on the existing filesystem.
I havent used it frequently enough to remember
Unetbootin is named as such because (IIRC) the netboot images (like mini.iso) are particularly easy to boot from USB :)
ok I will try that,, it certainly will be an advantage :)
... It's dishonest to waste peoples time by lying about which distribution you are using. Please don't suggest that people do so.
yes I thought that would be an issue  ,, thanks for pointing that out
